TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed SxsOption extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Indicates how side-by-side assemblies are configured for .

remarks.format: ## Remarks SxsOption is used for the value of <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.ServiceConfig.Inheritance%2A>.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.EnterpriseServices.SxsOption Ignore = int32(0)

Docs.summary: Side-by-side assemblies are not used within the enclosed context. Ignore is the default setting for <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.ServiceConfig.SxsOption%2A> when <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.ServiceConfig.Inheritance%2A> is set to .

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.EnterpriseServices.SxsOption Inherit = int32(1)

Docs.summary: The current side-by-side assembly of the enclosed context is used. Inherit is the default setting for P:System.EnterpriseServices.ServiceConfig.SxsOption?qualifyHint=False

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.EnterpriseServices.SxsOption New = int32(2)

Docs.summary: A new side-by-side assembly is created for the enclosed context.
